snippet: Market Share won the $1.5 million Hambletonian at Meadowlands Racetrack in East Rutherford, N.J., making Linda Toscano the first female trainer to win trotting’s premier race.
abstract: Market Share wins the $1.5 million Hambletonian harness race at Meadowlands Racetrack in East Rutherford, NJ, making Linda Toscano the first female trainer to win trotting’s premier race.
lead_paragraph: Market Share won the $1.5 million Hambletonian at Meadowlands Racetrack in East Rutherford, N.J., making Linda Toscano the first female trainer to win trotting’s premier race.
